text: Arthur had adopted his normal crisis role, which was to be expected, but that was fine because they didn't get invited to those sort of parties. #LifeTheUniverseAndEverything

passages.fragment: Arthur had adopted his normal crisis role , which was to
passages.full_quote: <used>Arthur had adopted his normal crisis role, which was to</used> stand with his mouth hanging open and let it all wash over him

passages.fragment: , which was to be expected , but that was
passages.full_quote: He looked exactly like himself, albeit like himself after he'd had a terrible fright, <used>which was to be expected, but that was</used> him, that was normal

passages.fragment: , but that was fine because they did n't
passages.source_name: So Long And Thanks For All The Fish
passages.full_quote: The garage attendant didn't think much of their car, <used>but that was fine because they didn't</used> either

passages.fragment: because they did n't get invited to those sort of parties
passages.full_quote: Many respectable physicists said that they weren't going to stand for this - partly because it was a debasement of science, but mostly <used>because they didn't get invited to those sort of parties</used>
